panels.description: Number of PDU sessions requested to setup (28.522 section 5.1.1.5.1). CU-CP counter per NR cell. The measurement is split into subcounters per S-NSSAI
panels.title: PDU SESSION SETUP REQUESTS

panels.description: Intra gNB counter incremented at both intra and inter DU handover. Incremented by one at sending of RRC Reconfiguration message to initiate the handover in the UE
panels.title: INTRA GNB HANDOVER EXECUTIONS

panels.description: Intra gNB counter incremented at both intra and inter DU handover. Incremented by one on reception of RRC Reconfiguration Complete
panels.title: INTRA GNB HANDOVER SUCCESSES
